item.title: Milky Mist Dairy
item.description: Milky Mist Dairy (MMD) is an Indian manufacturer of dairy products, based in Perundurai, Tamil Nadu. Formed in 1997 by T. Sathish Kumar, Milky Mist is engaged in milk procurement, processing, and manufacturing of other dairy products. Milky Mist's products include frozen food, dairy, desserts, food enhancers and yogurts.
